original_text: While they were talking like this, Jesus himself came near to them. He started to walk along with them.
korean_text: 그들이 서로 이야기하며 문의할 때에 예수께서 가까이 이르러 그들과 동행하시나

sentences.original_text: While they were talking like this
Jesus himself came near to them
He started to walk along with them
